INBOX_MGMT.SIDEBAR_TXT:
Inbox

An inbox is a communication channel for your customers to reach out to you. It can be in the form of a live website chat, social media platforms like Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, or messaging apps like Line, Telegram, or anything else.

Click on Add Inbox to connect a website or a Facebook Page.

You can add unlimited inboxes to your account. To access the list of inboxes, click

on this page and follow the prompts.

With all of your inboxes in one place, you can easily keep track of all customer conversations under the
tab. To view conversations specific to a particular inbox, click on the inbox name on the left-side panel of the dashboard.

LIST.404: There are no inboxes added to this account.

CREATE_FLOW.title: Select channel
CREATE_FLOW.body: Select your preferred communication channel to integrate with Chatwoot.

CREATE_FLOW.title: Create inbox
CREATE_FLOW.body: Authenticate your account and create an inbox.

CREATE_FLOW.title: Add agents
CREATE_FLOW.body: Assign agents associated with the created inbox.

CREATE_FLOW.title: Voila!
CREATE_FLOW.body: You are all set to go!

AUTH.TITLE: Choose a channel
AUTH.DESC: Select an inbox from the list below and start setting it up (it will be quicker than instant noodles). If you're looking for something more custom, you can create a new channel using the API channel.

AGENTS.TITLE: Agents
AGENTS.DESC: Select agents from the dropdown below to manage this inbox. If you need to invite an agent first, visit the

tab from the left sidebar.
Only these selected agents will have access to your inbox. Agents which are not part of this inbox will not be able to see or respond to messages in this inbox when they login.
If you are an administrator and need access to all inboxes, add yourself as an agent to all inboxes.
AGENTS.VALIDATION_ERROR: Add at least one agent to your new inbox.

DETAILS.TITLE: Inbox details
DETAILS.DESC: From the dropdown below, select the Facebook page you want to connect to Chatwoot. You can also give a custom name to your inbox for better identification.

FINISH.TITLE: Nailed it!
FINISH.DESC:
You have successfully finished integrating your Facebook Page with Chatwoot. Next time a customer messages your page, the conversation will automatically appear on your dashboard.
We are also providing you with a widget script that you can easily add to your website. Once this is live on your website, customers can message you right from your website without the help of any external tool and the conversation will appear right here, on Chatwoot.
Cool, huh? Well, we sure try to be. :)

EMAIL_PROVIDER.TITLE: Select your email provider
EMAIL_PROVIDER.DESCRIPTION: Select an email provider from the list below. If you don't see your email provider in the list, you can select the other provider option and provide the IMAP and SMTP credentials.

MICROSOFT.TITLE: Microsoft email
MICROSOFT.DESCRIPTION: To get started, click on the 'Sign in with Microsoft' button. You will then be redirected to the email sign-in page. After accepting the requested permissions, you will be redirected back to the inbox creation step.
MICROSOFT.HELP: To add your Microsoft account as a channel, authenticate it by clicking on 'Sign in with Microsoft'.
MICROSOFT.ERROR_MESSAGE: There was an error connecting to Microsoft. Please try again.

DETAILS.ERROR_FB_AUTH: Something went wrong, please refresh page...

FINISH.WEBSITE_SUCCESS: You have successfully finished creating a website channel. Copy the code shown below and paste it on your website. Next time a customer use the live chat, the conversation will automatically appear on your dashboard.

FEATURES.LABEL: Features
FEATURES.DISPLAY_FILE_PICKER: Display file picker on the widget
FEATURES.DISPLAY_EMOJI_PICKER: Display emoji picker on the widget
FEATURES.ALLOW_END_CONVERSATION: Allow users to end conversation from the widget

SETTINGS_POPUP.MESSENGER_SUB_HEAD: Place this button inside your body tag.
SETTINGS_POPUP.INBOX_AGENTS_SUB_TEXT: Add or remove agents from this inbox.
SETTINGS_POPUP.ENABLE_EMAIL_COLLECT_BOX_SUB_TEXT: Enable or disable email collect box on new conversation
SETTINGS_POPUP.ENABLE_CSAT_SUB_TEXT: Enable/Disable CSAT(Customer satisfaction) survey after resolving a conversation
SETTINGS_POPUP.ENABLE_CONTINUITY_VIA_EMAIL_SUB_TEXT: Conversations will continue over email if the contact email address is available.
SETTINGS_POPUP.LOCK_TO_SINGLE_CONVERSATION_SUB_TEXT: Enable or disable multiple conversations for the same contact in this inbox
SETTINGS_POPUP.AUTO_ASSIGNMENT_SUB_TEXT: Enable or disable the automatic assignment of new conversations to the agents added to this inbox.
SETTINGS_POPUP.HMAC_DESCRIPTION: In order to validate the user's identity, you can pass an `identifier_hash` for each user. You can generate a HMAC sha256 hash using the `identifier` with the key shown here.
SETTINGS_POPUP.HMAC_MANDATORY_DESCRIPTION: If enabled, requests missing the `identifier_hash` will be rejected.
SETTINGS_POPUP.INBOX_IDENTIFIER_SUB_TEXT: Use the `inbox_identifier` token shown here to authentication your API clients.
SETTINGS_POPUP.FORWARD_EMAIL_SUB_TEXT: Start forwarding your emails to the following email address.
SETTINGS_POPUP.ALLOW_MESSAGES_AFTER_RESOLVED_SUB_TEXT: Allow the end-users to send messages even after the conversation is resolved.
SETTINGS_POPUP.WHATSAPP_SECTION_SUBHEADER: This API key is used for the integration with the WhatsApp APIs.
SETTINGS_POPUP.WHATSAPP_SECTION_UPDATE_SUBHEADER: Enter the updated key to be used for the integration with the WhatsApp APIs.
SETTINGS_POPUP.WHATSAPP_SECTION_UPDATE_PLACEHOLDER: Enter the new API key here.

AUTO_ASSIGNMENT.MAX_ASSIGNMENT_LIMIT_RANGE_ERROR: Please enter a value greater than 0.
AUTO_ASSIGNMENT.MAX_ASSIGNMENT_LIMIT_SUB_TEXT: Limit the maximum number of conversations from this inbox that can be auto assigned to an agent.

BUSINESS_HOURS.TOGGLE_AVAILABILITY: Enable agent availability for this inbox.
BUSINESS_HOURS.UNAVAILABLE_MESSAGE_DEFAULT: We are unavailable at the moment. Leave a message we will respond once we are back.
BUSINESS_HOURS.TOGGLE_HELP: Enabling business availability will display available hours on the live chat widget, even if all agents are offline. During non-available hours, visitors can be notified with a message and a pre-chat form.

DAY.VALIDATION_ERROR: Starting time should be before closing time.
